Text:
Nagoya - Day 11 2010

Language : Japanese (No translation available)

The *.AVI recording was made from digital cable through S-cable, then reprocessed to 720x480 Xvid *.AVI from its original *.MPG format

Here is all that is available this Nagoya Basho 2010.  Here is the highlights ?Light? version of what?s available from TV Japan.  As some of you may not have heard, the Nagoya Basho has been rocked with scandal!  NHK has cancelled their usual coverage of the event.  
Many of the Rikshi have been suspended this Basho, including the firing of Ozeki Kotomitsuki!
Files included;  (click on the files you want!)
-	Nagoya.Day.11.avi
-	Nagoya.Day.11.mpg
-	NHK Cancelled Coverage.docx (a few news stories and links)
-	Torrent downloaded from Dxxxxoid.com.txt
